answers.answer: These are questions that you need to discuss with your Oncologist and whichever Physician has prescribed Bonista as well as your Endocrinologist who is treating your diabetes. We here cannot adequately give answers without benefit of your complete medical history.  Regards .....

question: I have been taking bonista injection for osteoporosis for the last four months. though there has been a slow improvement, i have been asked to take this for two years.would like to know if there are any side effects, especially when I have diabetes under control and has gone thru the first course of chemo after mastectomy.At present the creatinine levels are high cause of chemo and hence not able to complete the second course on time
title: Bonista-side effects
